name: Chestnut Puree
keywords: chestnut, chicken stock, heavy cream, side dish, winter
recipeIngredient: 2 cups fresh or canned chicken stock

recipeInstructions.text: Place the chestnuts in a saucepan with the chicken stock and celery. Simmer, covered, for 20 to 30 minutes or until the chestnuts are soft. Drain well.
Put the chesnuts through a food mill or ricer and, while they are still hot, beat in the butter, hot milk and cream using a small whisk or spoon. Salt to taste. Serve hot.
